mapper.insert: insert into t_supplier (id, num, address, entid, name, entname, linkphone, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update t_supplier
num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entid = #{entid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entname = #{entname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
linkphone = #{linkphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_supplier set num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entid = #{entid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entname = #{entname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkphone = #{linkphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from t_supplier where entid=#{entid} order by num limit 0,1
